General.Name: Tambun Indah Land Bhd
General.Description: Tambun Indah Land Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the development, construction, and management of properties in Malaysia. It operates through Investment Holding, Property Development and Management, and Other Operations segments. The company develops and manages land into vacant lots, residential, commercial, and industrial buildings. It also operates car parks. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Butterworth, Malaysia.
